website_summaries.verdict: A reliable, lightweight blower that’s packs a lot of power for the price. Perfect for cleaning and clearing pavement of leaves and cut grass.
pros: Good power in spite of lower cfm rating
cons: Great for consumer use but may not be powerful enough for professional leaf-blowing jobs
Can struggle to move wet grass from pavement

customer_reviews.title: Not too much for an average woman to carry!
customer_reviews.text: I was so intimidated when I took this out of the box. I am a 5'4" woman (140lbs.), and I was worried it would be too hard to maneuver. No way! It was so easy and definitely worth the investment for leaf season. Glad I took a chance on it!
customer_reviews.author: MommyKel

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent blower
customer_reviews.text: I got this blower after reading the reviews. At first, I was a little non-plussed, but as I got comfortable using it, I've grown to like it a lot. I'd suggest using TruFuel as it helps with the starting process. It's pretty expensive on Amazon so I'm buying at at Home Depot: [...] I'd also recommend using hearing protection as this thing is loud as full bore. And finally, be sure to use eye protection as this thing stirs up a lot of dust.
customer_reviews.author: Copyboy

customer_reviews.title: **not 251 mph** & The gas tank screw on top is iffy! - won't screw on properly, leaks your gas
customer_reviews.text: I like the tightness of how it sits on your back, I like the flexibility of the movement I don't like the fact that this says 251 mph air flow and this is definitely not pushing 251 mph.. DEFINITELY NOT!!! I think they liked on that part! I don't like that the cap of the gas tank leaks my expensive already mixed gas..... really rediculous! I'm going to use it a few more times and see what I feel and if my mind changes, then I'll come back and make any adjustments on this review.
customer_reviews.author: E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not As Much Power As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit to replace a 145BT that I have owned for about 20 years. The 145 has always started with 5 or 6 pulls, even after sitting in the garage for months without use. I expected the 150BT to start as easily as the 145, and also have more power. I was dissappointed with the power of the 150, as well as the number of pulls it took to start it during the first few operations (20-30 pulls). The new unit seems to have the same power as the older unit, and hopefully the starting will be easier in the future. The $300 price of the new unit seems a bit high for what I got.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck, Cherry Hill, NJ

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad back that's debilitating and I am disabled
customer_reviews.text: More impressed with this than I thought I would be. Powerful and easy-to-use. I have a bad back that's debilitating and I am disabled. To wear this is very comfortable and actually takes any pressure off my lower back! It would take me 2 days to use a hand blower on my driveway because of my back, now I can do in under 2 hours!!
customer_reviews.author: MPAULSON01

customer_reviews.title: I like the power of this blower
customer_reviews.text: I like the power of this blower. I have a lot of leaves to clear, and this blower handles the deep piles with ease and in a lot less time than the hand-held blowers. Beware, if you are not sure-footed, or in your sixties or older, this extra weight on your back may throw you off balance, especially if you have any small banks to deal with. This blower has saved me a lot of time in leaf cleanup. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Gilson

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Experience!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this at the end of September and used it about 5 times and now when I need it most it doesn’t work at all. What a POS! What’s better, is that no one in my immediate area will handle it under Husqvarna warranty. I couldn’t be more disappointed in my purchase. I bought this to replace $130 Ryobi that lasted me 6 years. What a waste of money. Buy one from Lowe’s or Home Depot so you don’t have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Triple Jay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed in packaging!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned Husqvarna before many times. Snow blower, Mower, Trimmer and an older blower. My blower was 12 or more years old and the only reason I purchased this new one was; I could not get parts for the old unit anymore. The Handle clamp on this 150BT is a real cheap plastic and they certainly do not package it correctly since I am not the only one here who has had this happen. I'm rating this 3 stars for now. I have not even ran this to test it because it might be going back if Husqvarna does not contact me and send a new Throttle assembly part.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sorbello

customer_reviews.title: Frustrated
customer_reviews.text: Eh, my 1st 2 seasons have been great with it, but now less than 2 years old and have to spend 200 to repair it. I've only used the recommended gas etc. and the carburetor still got all clogged up. I still would buy a Husqvarna, but just wish I bought it from my local dealer and not Amazon. I feel the quality here is different than a local shop like they use less expensive parts for a cheaper price.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Verissimo

customer_reviews.title: Good Homeowner blower
customer_reviews.text: The reason this got 4 instead of 5 stars was because its kinda hard to start. The pull cord is pretty hard to pull. If you time it right and give it a couple of 6" pulls then a full pull it works a little better sometimes. You also have to play with the choke. It can take 5 or 6 pulls to start it. Once you get the hang of starting it you get a pretty decent amount of power. Someone reviewed that it sucked down the gas too fast. I found I could go almost 3 hours of constant blowing per tank.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: I just took this thing out of the box. I bought the premixed husqvarna fuel. Started up, ran for about 5 minuets then just shut off. Took it off my back, started it, but it back on my back, ran for 5 minuets then quit. Did it again 6 times. I was watching to make sure I wasn’t accidentally hitting the off switch. There are no phone #s to call for problems! Not even a trouble shouting section in the instructions. They only offer a phone number for a service center. Must send it back at your own expense. This unit will be sent back tomorrow morning and I’ll get one that offers som support to its customers.
customer_reviews.author: Kalibungo

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product!! It arrived on time, un-boxing, set up was extremely simple. I was out of town for most of fall, so i knew cleaning the leaves would be a demanding project. After setting up, this blower i thought "i really hope this is gonna help". Started it, and i was pleasantly surprised with its power! It moved all the leaves that piled on effortlessly! I love it, i recommend it for what it delivered!!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I'm 76 and don't have the strength where I would have it easy as with the lawn mower or hand blower
customer_reviews.text: As many have mentioned, the power of this is great--did my front yard in half the time as with my hand blower. The only problem I see is it is fairly hard to start. When pulling the starter there is a point that you have to pull very hard to get it going and it takes several pulls. I'm 76 and don't have the strength where I would have it easy as with the lawn mower or hand blower.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Bloomfield

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this I thought -- OMG --- why did I wait so long to buy a backpack blower? It is just fantastic. However, be advised, it is heavy. I am pretty fit but using this is a workout. Also, be careful on uneven ground. I have nearly fallen a few times by stumbling over obstacles and stepping down on uneven ground. Still, this is the bad-boy that gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ward

customer_reviews.title: NO POWER LOW PRESSURE DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: It has no power lacks acceleration very disappointing, terrible as if the leaves refused to move no pressure was I sold a lemon, was this item checked before it left the factory, who check behind the checker that authorized the blower to be sold, waste of money, this should be against the law to misrepresent a product, had I known I would have never purchased this product
customer_reviews.author: wowmcjam

customer_reviews.title: Zero problem leaf blower.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and perfectly strong enough to clear leaves and grass on my 100 foot by 200 foot yard. Also works extremely well drying off my cars, sidewalks,driveway,porches, and decks. I am extremely careful to use non-ethanol gas. And over the last two months this product has worked perfectly and started without issue. It arrived packed well as ordered and quickly. I have no complaints about this particular product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burch

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: After using my $330 blower 4 times at the time of purchase in October 2018, I pulled it out today to get to work on the leaves.Once I put fresh gas in the blowerI found that it was very difficult to start and once started it would stall. I called Husqvarna and they directed me to a repair shop to get the carburator adjusted. They then proceeded to tell me that the 2 year warranty isn't for the issue I am having and that I would have to pay for repairs. Moral of the story, don't buy Husqvarna anything. They don't seem to give a sh&% that their product is defective and their customer are Very unhappy. Shameful business practices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Backpack Blower!
customer_reviews.text: My son has almost 1.5 acres of oak trees. I bought this for him on Christmas 2017. I went over to help with my conventional blower. Needless to say I now understand why he needed the backpack type, my arms were sore for a week and he thought that was funny. I recommend this specific unit for its power and velocity, it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: D. G. S. Jr

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any homeowner
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is awesome, I have an extreme amount of leaves as I live in the country and this backpack blower will blow wet leaves like they were nothing and I also use it to blow snow off my driveway as long as it's the powdery snow vs wet but it'll blow about 3" of powder in no time flat. For me this is a must have and would recommend to anyone who hates taking for hours on end
customer_reviews.author: Keith C.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Have used this blower about four times now. For all big commercial sized areas. 2500 sq feet or more. The blower itself is quite quiet, and it can run full blast for hours on end. Which you should never really need anyways. The speed of the blower blows everything around you would need in your yard. And trash as well. May even work for light snow! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: White

customer_reviews.title: Dirt be gone
customer_reviews.text: We live in a seasonal part of the USA & post winter we have lots of sand to get ride of from the roads. This is comfortable to wear, works great & gets the job done. I Love how it blows all the dirt, etc from the porches, & even off the side of the house! It's not what I would consider "light" to carry, due to the big motor on it, but once you get it on your back, it's VERY comfortable to "wear". I put mine up on a shelf where it's the right height for me to just slip into the shoulder straps. I LOVE IT! Great product that arrived undamaged & on time.
customer_reviews.author: Randye

customer_reviews.title: Strong machine
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and well built. Easy start and not too heavy. The only negative is the harness is too stiff and rough on your shoulders. I suppose wearing a heavy jacket would help but the hot weather could be a problem. I bought another brand harness that has a smooth finish and that cured the problem all but the $34.00 paid.Great machine
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J

customer_reviews.title: Try before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it based on reviews...it’s a nice piece of equipment, but for light to moderate use. I have a lot of leaves to move, and this model just didn’t have the moving power I needed. I ended up selling it and bought a substantially larger model.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Altmayer

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: One year later (not even!!!!!!) and blower will not start up. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Y

customer_reviews.title: Great leaf blower at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This blower is a gift to kid of mine who has a huge yard. Rather then me going to his house with my equipment, I bought and sent it to him. Was he surprised! Even more surprising was the amount of leaves that he quickly moved off his 1/3 acre lot. Easy assembly, starting instructions. and operation. I will be replacing my blower with this model when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Wiilieboy

customer_reviews.title: great blower
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Easy to use. I love the belt around my waist. Much more balanced than our old one and the gas tank is bigger, so I can do more on one tankful. I still have trouble starting the blower myself, but besides that it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs McK

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Received product with broken throttle handle upon opening the box. Amazon won't accept return or exchange. FU! So, yeah, I'm not very happy and definitely not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Don  W.

customer_reviews.title: Good Leaf Blower...when you can get it started
customer_reviews.text: The leaf blower does a very effective job of removing leaves. Once the handle has been adjusted correctly, it is fairly easy to control the nozzle to collect the leaves into a neat pile. However, the one negative is that the pull cord is difficult to operate while holding the body of leaf blower stationary. It sometimes requires 10 to 15 cord pulls to start the blower. Perhaps it may improve with use, but out of the box the starting mechanism seems to be very stiff.
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, industrial strength
customer_reviews.text: Having used for years a hand held blower, I can honestly say this product is amazing. I complete my yard work in a fraction of the time and having piles of falling leaves do not scare me anymore. Having a cabin in the woods as well, it has been the best investment in recent years. Highly recommend and believe you will see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Martin A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice residential leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice leaf blower for residential use. Assembled and fired up about 10min out of the box. The plastic tube pieces are a bit tricky to assemble as they slip in your hands when trying to twist, but not a big deal. The blower has plenty of power to lift leaves out of flower beds and also leaves that are matted down.
customer_reviews.author: EngineerJon

customer_reviews.title: Putting hose together
customer_reviews.text: The end hose wouldn't stay hooked on had a lot of trouble getting it on to stay. Other than that I should have got this years ago. Starts right up and is light, and it moves a ton of leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: I can start it myself!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 48 year old woman who likes to be independent and do things on my own. I was not able to start our other leaf blower and had to ask my husband to do it for me...well, I can start this one myself! I am also short-to-average (5'3") , and so the length of the arm hose blower part is a little long for me and a little stiff...probably with more use it will limber up and I will get used to it! Overall, I love this and am very happy I asked for this for my Christmas present last year!
customer_reviews.author: Mark H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blower Promise
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is the best! Saved me lots of time. I am a small 5.1 foot woman and its kinda heavy but I can handle it. This thing can blow for sure!! I would buy again. I have tons of leaves in the fall that take me forever and raking just is exhausting. If looking for a blower get this you will not regret.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Newman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap not inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The plastic parts cannot be cheaper (from grip to nozzle weak/thin plastic). I feel I make a grave mistake opting for this Husqvarna over the slightly more expensive Echo. Before even putting this together I have to decide whether I return and purchase quality over price. Very disappointed $300. does not buy quality anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: game changer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to upgrade from my small, corded leaf blower. I live in an area that is surrounded by large, mature trees, so with the corded blower, I would literally spend hours in the fall blowing leaves. With this new blower, my work has been reduced drastically. I am a 5'2" female and have no issues starting this, wearing this around the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Be The Good...

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a cheap Hitachi handheld blower that is rated at 150 mph. This so called professional unit is about the same power as the $89 Hitachi. I was expecting it to be able to blow leafs off my pool screen roof but its barely moving them. Useless, sent it back within hour of receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Scholes

customer_reviews.title: Update to my review
customer_reviews.text: About a year after purchase and less than a dozen uses on my own yard, and I find now I have to revise my original review. The starter has increasingly become more difficult, and it began to leak gas. Husqvarna's service is poor. I wish now I had purchased another brand where service support is available.
customer_reviews.author: Manafan509

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far after using for 3 hours the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to blow leave at my farm. I read many reviews and all I can say is this one really blows the leaves. It was a breeze to start. I never had to pull the cord more than 3 times and did not have to pull hard either. Love it so far after using for 3 hours the first time out.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt ThompsonTop Contributor: Woodworking

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to start, very powerful and does not use much gasoline. I was able to use it for a little less than an hour and it only used up half a tank which is about half a gallon.
customer_reviews.author: King Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: I am 45+ miles from the nearest dealer. Husqvarna is not honoring the warranty unless I take it to a dealer. 45+ miles each way. DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT! YOU WILL NOT BE COVERED UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCE UNLESS YOU ARE NEAR AN AUTHORIZED DEALER
customer_reviews.author: maria padron

customer_reviews.title: Great leaf blower!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a BEAST! Cleared my backyard and put them in neat little piles in no time! Happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: filled it with the recommended fuel, and on the second pull it started ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my Husqvarna 150BT yesterday afternoon. I assembled it (20 min), filled it with the recommended fuel, and on the second pull it started right up and ran perfectly until I had to refuel. I used it for about 3+ hours and it ran as I expected - PERFECT... I can honestly say – WELL WORTH THE MONEY... Hence the reason you have earned 5 stars from me...
customer_reviews.author: SteveNC

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it from your local Husqvarna dealer
customer_reviews.text: Well I can't review how well it works because it arrived broken like other reviews experienced. Seeing as I now have to take this to a dealer to get the warranty started I could have saved a ton of time by just buying it there instead.
customer_reviews.author: PewPewPew

customer_reviews.title: Ok Blower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and i like it because it is light, but it lacks power. I have the bigger commercial 750 they came out with last yr and I love the power of it but it is just so heavy. I wish they would come out with a light weight back pack blower like the 150 with the power of the commercial grade 750 back pack blower with a price close to the 350 models!
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn R. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Should have got one sooner. What use to take me 6 hours now takes 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: S. Denni

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for a better build quality
customer_reviews.text: I feel for the money it would have had better components . The blower tube feels very cheap and pretty much all other plastic parts. I have had other brands and they had high impact plastic vs what this company is using.
customer_reviews.author: rocci berrini

customer_reviews.title: The thing really blows
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blower lots of power. It is light and easy to use. it was pretty easy to put together. i had it out of the box and was blowing leaves in less than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: On the ridge

customer_reviews.title: Owned less than a year -- about 10 uses (So far so good)
customer_reviews.text: It is a little heavy (which is expected). The power is pretty good (more money = more power). I've used for a maximum of 10 minutes about 10x. Has never taken more than 3 pulls to start. Overall, I'm pretty satisfied. Make a more comfortable grip -- or a way to keep it attached to your arm and I would give 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very powerful
customer_reviews.text: It’s winter so my husband has only used this once so far, but it’s very powerful and good quality. Can’t complain so far. I will say it is extremely heavy in my opinion, but my husband doesn’t have an issue with the weight at all so I guess it just depends on your size.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Following a move, I need to get a leaf blower to replace my battery-operated model. The battery-operated model just didn't have the force I needed. This one is more than sufficient and moves leaves better than I expected on about 3/4 acres. Gas tank is large enough to work for an hour without the need to re-fill.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy A. Benington

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Cuts time!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the one I had. Made cleaning up my yard quite a bit faster. Very happy with the purchase. I would definitely recommend to anyone with a hand held blower as an upgrade at a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: so cool!!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Just the right power
customer_reviews.text: Great blower, and glad I bought it. I can see why it's a #1 of 2019 blower. I have a rather large front yard with a huge sycamore tree that sheds bark in the summer, and it moved that just fine. Why spend $200 more for a Stihl of equal power? I don't know if it's a Kawasaki motor like their older ones, but it runs top.
customer_reviews.author: Perry B.

customer_reviews.title: Back Pack is Heavy hard to start
customer_reviews.text: The backpack does have good air volume compared to my old hand held unit. But it is heavy and seems hard to pull at times to start I blow leaves and stuff off my roof but I think I would be afraid about using on the roof as I think I would have a balance issue due to the weight of the unit
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Lento

customer_reviews.title: Gas Backpack Leaf Blower
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back to the company and have it replaced, it did not work when I got the one from Husqvarna. I will probably never get another product from them.
customer_reviews.author: Judith  Foley

customer_reviews.title: More Power!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! Runs around like Tim Taylor yelling, "more power!" Excellent for our few acres with many trees.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Little Pricey but Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this a lot yet. Maybe 3 or 4 times. This far it is very bit and possibly more than expected. I had an old hand held Poland brand that worked great for the need until it wore out (7# years of annual use). I was a bit discouraged by the price and kept debating it and finally took the plunge to try it out. Much quieter than my old one and way more powerful. The straps are comfortable and its very lightweight. I can’t give it a 5 star right now as I’ve only used it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is great! I am a small female and I used this for a good 10 hours the first day I got it! I had some soreness the next day (which is to be expected with that much yard work), but not NEARLY as sore as I was using a handheld leaf blower. I have and would recommend this leaf blower to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: This leaf blower is so powerful that all the leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is so powerful that all the leaves that have been untouched on my property for decades had no problem being moved (even through all the low growing blueberry bushes EVERYWHERE). Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny P.

customer_reviews.title: Can seem intimidating at first but once your using it very easy to maneuver and gets the job done quickly
customer_reviews.text: The power is unbelievable! Very lightweight once on your back. Can seem intimidating at first but once your using it very easy to maneuver and gets the job done quickly! Couple of plastic parts that worry me a little but no big deal. Overall great name and a great product. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Expected more
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but I thought it would be more powerful for the money. Big purchase for my broke ass.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy K

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower but needs longer tube!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack blower it works great. We had about 2 inches of powder snow this morning and I was able to clear it from my gravel driveway in a decent amount of time. I think I use it more in the winter to clear snow, than in the fall to clear leaves. It starts right up even below zero and runs great! The only drawback is that the tube is a little short. I am 6 foot tall and could use another extension. Unfortunately, I have not found anywhere that I can buy the middle extension tube!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a decent size yard and needed one of these for a while. Did the research and this one rated good so I went for it. Could not be happier with the purchase. Have used it over a dozen times already.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kane

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but poor packaging item came broken
customer_reviews.text: Came with a broken handle like for a lot of people
customer_reviews.author: M Herman

customer_reviews.title: No idea why I waited so long to buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Had a handheld blower for years and thought it was doing a good enough job for 1/3 acre yard with tons of leaves. Earlier this year the handle finally broke. I figured since everyone else used these type blowers there must be a reason. Best money I've ever spent. Cut my leaf blowing time in half and was effortless. Read the instructions, added gas, started maybe second pull and off I went. Didn't stop till it ran out of gas. Will note that it does seem you need to wait a few minutes afelter refilling to start it again. No problem at all. Did that and off I went again. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ryan f

customer_reviews.title: This blower is awesome, have had one for 13 years and going strong
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic blower! I bought this one as a backup to the same model that I've had for 13 years old and I love. Proactively bought a second one in case Husqvarna discontinues it and my first one finally dies.
customer_reviews.author: Don Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Broken within warranty window. Warranty Claim denied.
customer_reviews.text: After about 24 months of operation in a residential application, the blower seized up. Having always used 50:1 mix ration with fuel, Husqvarna blamed poor quality fuel for issues and will not issue a warranty claim for the blower. Not in the market to spend $300 every 2-years for a blower. Will not be purchasing a Husqvarna product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: A little heavier than I thought it would be, but not bad. Lot's of power moves even wet leaves. Don't assemble air nozles when cold. Need to be warm so plastic can stretch a little.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for large areas
customer_reviews.text: Use to clean up leaves and debris off of large landscape areas. Works very good and starts easy.
customer_reviews.author: RRLarry

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Seller and shipping speed! This is my second Husqvarna 150BT and it is the best blower i have ever had. The first one I owned is now at my son's, He borrowed it so much that I gave it to him and bought another
customer_reviews.author: Ron Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great blow...
customer_reviews.text: With decent ear protection, it's very quiet. Powerful and able to blow leaves and debris from under, tangled within, bushes.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob K

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with purchase, works great & saves me a lot of time in yardwork!
customer_reviews.author: S Paul

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY ON AMAZON; Machine delivered with broken parts.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this on Amazon. Item was delivered defective. It was not packed well. The hose bracket attached to the hand switch is broken. Seller does not take returns. You have to chase down the manufacturer for the spare part. Good luck in the cocos-19 environment.
customer_reviews.author: J Brady

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse blower!
customer_reviews.text: Strong and powerful, cleared my 450 ft. driveway in 20 minutes! Easy to use and wear on your back so no bending or hand strain.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Blower strength is excellent. I have a fairly large yard
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver!! After years of back breaking raking, I finally gave in. It is not too heavy, and feels very well balanced on my back. Blower strength is excellent. I have a fairly large yard, with a ton of trees. I used to dread fall. Not anymore!!!
customer_reviews.author: K Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Worst leaf blower I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This unit is a pc of junk I starts but will not run for more than 5 minutes it has been to authorized repair numerous times service center although very helpful can’t seem to correct problem
customer_reviews.author: RONALD CHARBONNEAU

customer_reviews.title: Does the job magnificently.
customer_reviews.text: A very powerful, very effective leaf blower. It moved large quantities of leaves, even when damp or covered in frost. It was very comfortable to carry for 2+ hours at a time. Assembly was simple. Starts first time every time. An invaluable addition to my tool shed!
customer_reviews.author: N31LD

customer_reviews.title: I found a better price, got a price match
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 150 here. I found a better price , got a price match.easy to assemble,started right up,two tanks of gas,my yard is cleared of a lot of leaves and sticks.Only thing I added a strap across my chest to hold the shoulder straps closer together. I love this blower, it is like having an air cannon in your hand. Amazingly not to loud, and it can use my husky premix for my husky 55 chain saw. It is comfortable to carry and is good for about 70 min on a tank of fuel. which is easy on gas. thanks husky smokey
customer_reviews.author: sightseer

customer_reviews.title: Still working
customer_reviews.text: We bought this one in the fall of 2015. It is working just fine and no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Koke Citizen

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR HOMEOWNER
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a homeowner. Too weak for commercial use. Must store indoors (does not like being out in the rain). One of the best blowers you will find for home usage!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Houlihan

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It was for my son, he loves it. Perfect to keep leaves off his townhouse grass.
customer_reviews.author: margaret J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Just Do not buy this from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: A very good blower. Amazon will not accept a return on this or any fuel powered tool - even if just received and never used. Better off with flexibility at your local hardware chain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product....Husqvarna dealer will not service unit under warranty
customer_reviews.text: The trigger mechanism on my unit is faulty and needs to be replaced.. I took the unit in for service under the 2 year warranty and my local dealer will not service the unit because Amazon will not pay them for servicing the unit. So now I have less than 1 year old new unit that I can't get service on....I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started right up and blows air like a tornado
customer_reviews.text: Started right up and blows air like a tornado! Embedded leaves don't stand a chance. Whirlwind of a machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Rioux

customer_reviews.title: Quality products that works.
customer_reviews.text: Love this blower. Starts on first or second pull every-time and runs strong. I have been using it for a year now.
customer_reviews.author: PA_Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Great brand, quality and high speed. Cleans up my lawn with no problem. Very powerful. Moves crabapples in grass and everything else in its way.
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got for my dad for Christmas because he keeps borrowing money. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing step up from my electric blower. Wasnt a powerful a the RedMax I used to borrow from my friend, but its quieter, lighter, and I didn't really expect it to be as powerful, so overall I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blower
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful blower that is easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Owens

customer_reviews.title: The big bad wolf would be dining on 3 little pigs had he used a Husqvarna
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a leaf blowing monster. Absolutely love it. What would usually take me all day was accomplished in roughly 3 hours. A must have if your yard becomes buried in leaves in the fall. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of air power
customer_reviews.text: This piece of equipment blasts out more air than a gaggle of politicians. It puts out about twice what my sturdy four cycle Makita does.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M. Parzinger

customer_reviews.title: Stopped after 12 min
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 2 or 3 times since purchase. Today it Just stopped after 12 minutes. I can't pull the thing any more to Start it up. Don't know what to do?
customer_reviews.author: George S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Huge Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was simple, packaging was simple, fueling was simple, started on the 1st pull, very powerful - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Blow away
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blower. A little heavier than my old one, but much stronger blower.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I wanted something for my husband but lighter and easier for me to maneuver ! This thing DELIVERS!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: exactly as decribed
customer_reviews.text: not as heavy as other models IMO, felt good and I really like how the handle slides on your movement
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day early and works awesome. Cleared my lawn of leaves in half the time of my old handheld blower!
customer_reviews.author: SLammers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leaf blower.  Good power.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2-acre property with tons of mature trees and I take care of the whole thing with this blower. Great unit. I feel power is just right, as any more power would possibly rip up the grass at close range.
customer_reviews.author: warchildnyc

customer_reviews.title: excellent blower.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blower. Worked every time I pulled the cord for years with intense daily use. Then someone stole both my husqvarna 150bt and 350 out of my trailer. Went and bought a two year old used one $120 and cranks up and run every time and all day.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew M

customer_reviews.title: Break it in with trufuel
customer_reviews.text: Great product for homeowners. Not too big not too small. Just wright. Very strong all the power you will need to blow the leaves off your lawn like a professional.
customer_reviews.author: James Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: I just love it.
customer_reviews.text: This will do the job for any home owner. It will move even small rocks or small tree branches or wet leafs or what ever you need it for. I just love it.
customer_reviews.author: adimrom

product_meta.title: Husqvarna 150BT, 50.2cc 2-Cycle 434 CFM 251 MPH Professional 2-Cycle Gas Backpack Leaf Blower
product_meta.description: Size:Husqvarna 150BT Blower Only The Husqvarna 150BT is a commercial grade backpack leaf blower in the 50cc mid-size range. It features a powerful X-Torq engine. The harness and controls are ergonomically designed for high capacity and ease of use. Idle speed rpm 2200.Fuel consumption : 455 g/kWh
feature_bullets: X-TORQ ENGINE: The X-Torq engine design reduces harmful exhaust emissions by up to 60% and increases fuel efficiency by up to 20%
HIGH AIR VOLUME AND VELOCITY: Powerful clearing performance featuring 434 CFM Air Volume and 251 MPH Air Velocity
LOWVIB: Dampeners between the engine and chassis effectively reduce vibrations
AUTO RETURN STOP SWITCH: Stop switch automatically resets to the ON position for easier starting
CRUISE CONTROL: Variable speed throttle with cruise control can be set for easier handling

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars735 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
